runtimeSource.title: Runtime source
runtimeSource.description:
Select a source to load intial values for each zones runtime. These can be changed in HomeKit.
These sources need to be configured or present in B-Hyve app or the default time will be used.

displayValveType.title: Display Valves as
displayValveType.description: Select valve type to display when not displaying as irrigation system

showLimitsSensor.title: Expose Occupancy Sensors in HomeKit for Temperature high/low limits

showStandby.title: Expose switch for controller standby
showStandby.description: Exposes off mode switch, when turned on all schedules from B-hyve will be disabled.

showRunall.title: All zones
showRunall.description: Adds a switch to run all zones all device for the default time.

showSchedules.title: Expose switches for schedules
showSchedules.description: Exposes schedules as defined in the B-Hyve app as a switches for quick run from HomeKit.

layout.helpvalue:
Location Support

If you have more than one location and want to display them in separate Homebridge/HomeKit homes you can retrive only the devices at this street address otherwise leave blank.
The address must match the address configured in the b-hyve app, review the log file to see the adresses as configured in the b-hyve app.

Irrigation System

Display these accessories in HomeKit, display as a irrigation system with integrated sprinker zones.
If unchecked, the irrigation system zones will displayed as individual tiles with the option in Homekit to show single or separate.

Hose Timer

Display Hose Timers HT25 as a simple valve.

Flood Sensor

Display these sensors in HomeKit.
